title: 20+ Single male, loves long walks and LFT Ranked 5s / DUO out of bronze
body:
Hey guys, I'm way active **looking for a 5s team, or a duo partner** or two to climb out of Bronze. Currently at B1, doing silver level play.

Lane prefs: ADC, Mid > Sup, Top > Jg. But I can go any lane well.


This isn't a recruitment thread, but we have a large multigaming guild [DSA - Darkstar Alliance](http://darkstar-alliance.com/) on teamspeak with a fun loving mature LoL crowd of varying skill levels. If you're keen for a game or two, or a duo, or some folks to hang out with on comms, drop in casual or sign up if you're keen.


_Ready to kick_ _butt _and chew **chewing **gum.

replies.body: But im all out of gum t.t
Hope you also love long climbs, because that's what I predict you have ahead of you
Too true. All depends on your team. Me and my duo partner seem to have a bit more success when we try and influence 2 lanes at once. Bronzies often don't know how to deal with rotations.
